movie.title: Inception
movie.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious is given a chance to have his criminal record erased.

movie.title: The Dark Knight
movie.description: Batman faces the Joker.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.description: A group of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movie.title: The Matrix
movie.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movie.title: Gladiator
movie.description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movie.title: The Lion King
movie.description: The lion cub Simba is destined to succeed his father, but his uncle Scar has plans of his own.

movie.title: Avatar
movie.description: A paraplegic former Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the indigenous people.

movie.title: Forrest Gump
movie.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life story.

movie.title: Jurassic Park
movie.description: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park on an island in Costa Rica is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.

movie.title: The Godfather
movie.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movie.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movie.description: Peter Parker seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase the memories of everyone who knows that he is Spider-Man, but things go horribly wrong.

movie.title: Shutter Island
movie.description: A U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movie.title: Deadpool
movie.description: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor undergoes an experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

movie.title: La La Land
movie.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love, but their aspirations and different paths threaten their relationship.

movie.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movie.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

movie.title: Blade Runner 2049
movie.description: A young blade runner uncovers a secret that could plunge what's left of society into chaos, leading him on a quest to find Rick Deckard, a former blade runner who has been missing for three decades.

movie.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movie.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission goes wrong.

movie.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movie.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movie.title: Frozen
movie.description: When their kingdom becomes trapped in an eternal winter, Anna and her unlikely partner, Kristoff, must find her sister Elsa, the Snow Queen, to save their world.

movie.title: Tenet
movie.description: A protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

movie.title: Star Wars: The Force Awakens
movie.description: A scavenger named Rey, a stormtrooper defecting from the First Order, and a former pilot must join forces to defeat the menacing new threat in the galaxy.

movie.title: The Avengers
movie.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to stop the villain Loki from enslaving humanity.

movie.title: Fight Club
movie.description: An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman build a global organization to help vent male aggression.

movie.title: The Truman Show
movie.description: Truman Burbank is the star of a reality TV show, but he is unaware that his entire life is broadcast to the world.

movie.title: Rocky
movie.description: A small-time boxer gets a chance to fight the heavyweight champion of the world.

movie.title: Doctor Strange
movie.description: A brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon is forced to discover the mystical arts to heal himself after a car accident.

movie.title: The Social Network
movie.description: The story of the founding of Facebook, and the legal battles that followed.

movie.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movie.description: The sequel to Avatar, following Jake Sully and Neytiri as they explore the oceans of Pandora.

movie.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movie.description: Four high school students are transported into the world of Jumanji, where they must complete dangerous quests to escape.

movie.title: Knives Out
movie.description: When a renowned crime novelist is found dead, a detective investigates the dysfunctional family to uncover the truth.

movie.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movie.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with a warrior named Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord and his army.

movie.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
movie.description: The Guardians struggle to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill’s parentage.

movie.title: Interstellar
movie.description: A group of explorers set out to find a new habitable planet as Earth faces a slow extinction due to environmental collapse.

movie.title: The Prestige
movie.description: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry, each attempting to outwit the other with increasingly elaborate tricks.

movie.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movie.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he pursues a life-changing opportunity.

movie.title: La La Land
movie.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love, but their dreams begin to pull them apart.
